channel.title: Azazaya
channel.description: Personal Website of Kazi Abu Rousan

item.title: Special Function and it's generation
item.description: A brief discussion on Introduction on how to generate special functions using the tools of linear algebra.

item.title: Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration
item.description: A brief discussion on Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration. Here we will see how to perform this in julia language and also it's theory.

item.title: What exactly is Temperature
item.description: A visual understanding on how we can visualize Time Dilation as a simple result of coordinate transformation.

item.title: BooksLectureQFT1
item.description: List of Books and Lecture Notes for the QFT1 course taken by Kazi Abu Rousan

item.title: Intro2QFT_1
item.description: A Introductory course on Quantum Field Theory

item.title: LectureNotesandAssignmentQFT1
item.description: Lecture Notes and Assignment for the QFT1 course taken by Kazi Abu Rousan

item.title: Mnemonic for Riemann Curvature Tensor
item.description: Riemann Curvature Tensor is one of the most important thing in General Relativity. But how do we remember that?, well let's see here.

item.title: Physics Papers
item.description: A short description of the page which would serve as blurb in a RSS feed; you can use basic markdown here but the whole description string must be a single line (not a multiline string). Like this one for instance. Keep in mind that styling is minimal in RSS so for instance don't expect maths or fancy styling to work; images should be ok though:

item.title: What exactly is Light Momentum?
item.description: IN this blog, we will understand What exactly is Light Momentum? and from where exactly it is coming?

item.title: Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration
item.description: A brief discussion on Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration. Here we will see how to perform this in julia language and also it's theory.

item.title: Playing with Tupper's Formula in Julia
item.description: A brief intro to Tupper's Formula with Julia. Here we will see how to perform this in julia language.

item.title: Time Dilation as Coordinate Transformation
item.description: A visual understanding on how we can visualize Time Dilation as a simple result of coordinate transformation.

item.title: Reciprocals of Primes
item.description: A brief discussion on the fact that taking the reciprocals of primes will generate numbers which repeat after certain digits. Here we will understand why this happens and will write a code to find out the period.
